title: FunMail
description:
Fun-Mail - Instantly generate temporary emails using the mail.tm API! Keep your real inbox spam-free by using disposable emails for signups, verifications, and tests. Simple, fast, and secure — get privacy on the go with Fun-Mail!

With Fun-mail, you can receive email verifications, OTPs, and other sign-up confirmations without using your primary email. Perfect for exploring new products on Product Hunt without cluttering your main inbox.
